name: audio-format-converter
title: Audio Format Converter
description: Convert audio files between MP3, WAV, FLAC, OGG, and AAC formats
content:
Overview

This application converts audio files between different formats including MP3, WAV, FLAC, OGG, and AAC. Built using pydub, it provides high-quality audio format conversion with automatic handling of codecs and bitrates.

Features

  • Convert between MP3, WAV, FLAC, OGG, and AAC formats
  • Automatic format detection from input file
  • High-quality output with optimized bitrates
  • Preserves original filename with new extension

Parameters

  • Input Audio: Upload your audio file from stash
  • Output Format: Select MP3, WAV, FLAC, OGG, or AAC
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a converted audio file with the same base name but new extension in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Converting WAV files to MP3 for smaller file sizes
  • Converting MP3 to FLAC for lossless quality
  • Standardizing audio formats across a project
  • Preparing audio for specific platform requirements
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && mkdir -p /var/lib/apt/lists/partial && apt-get update -o Acquire::Languages=none && apt-get install -y ffmpeg && python "prod_apps/python/audio_format_converter.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -f "${outputFormat}"
